card.name: Gilford the Lightning
card.description: You can Tribute 3 monsters to Tribute Summon (but not Set) this card. If Summoned this way: Destroy all monsters your opponent controls.

card.name: Exarion Universe
card.description: During your Battle Step, if this card attacks a Defense Position monster: You can make this card lose exactly 400 ATK, and if it does, it will inflict piercing battle damage. These effects last until the end of this turn.

card.name: Vorse Raider
card.description: This wicked Beast-Warrior does every horrid thing imaginable, and loves it! His axe bears the marks of his countless victims.

card.name: Dark Magician Girl
card.description: Gains 300 ATK for every "Dark Magician" or "Magician of Black Chaos" in the GY.

card.name: Rocket Warrior
card.description: During your Battle Phase, this card cannot be destroyed by battle and you take no battle damage from attacks involving this card. If this card attacks a monster, after damage calculation: That attack target loses 500 ATK until the end of this turn.

card.name: Panther Warrior
card.description: This card cannot declare an attack unless you Tribute 1 monster.
